titleStmt.title: TO THE RIGHT HONOVRABLE MY SINGƲLAR GOOD LORD, SIR Henrie Danuers, Knight; Baron of Dantesey: A vvorthy patterne of all true Nobilitie, accomplished both for warre and peace; A munificent fauourer of all learning and vertue; I. H.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: TO THE RIGHT HONOVRABLE MY SINGƲLAR GOOD LORD, SIR Henrie Danuers, Knight; Baron of Dantesey: A vvorthy patterne of all true Nobilitie, accomplished both for warre and peace; A munificent fauourer of all learning and vertue; I. H.

monogr.title: Contemplations vpon the principal passages of the holie historie. The third volume: in three bookes. By I. Hall, Doctor of Diuinitie
monogr.author: Hall, Joseph

div.head: TO THE RIGHT HONOVRABLE MY SINGƲLAR GOOD LORD, SIR Henrie Danuers, Knight; Baron of Dantesey: A vvorthy patterne of all true Nobilitie, accomplished both for warre and peace; A munificent fauourer of all learning and vertue; I. H.

p.hi: With humble apprecation of all true happinesse, Dedicates this part of his poore Labors.
